summary: The user has relatively low cybersecurity skills, particularly in password management and phishing awareness.

recommendations.text: Improve your password management by using a password manager to generate and store complex passwords.
recommendations.reason: Your score in password management is low, indicating that you may be using weak or repetitive passwords, which are easy for hackers to exploit.

recommendations.text: Increase your awareness of phishing attacks by learning to recognize common phishing strategies.
recommendations.reason: Phishing awareness is crucial as it is a common method used by cybercriminals to steal sensitive information. Your current score suggests a need for better recognition skills.

recommendations.text: Enable two-factor authentication (2FA) on all your accounts to add an extra layer of security.
recommendations.reason: Two-factor authentication significantly enhances account security. While your score is moderate, improving this can greatly reduce unauthorized access.

recommendations.text: Regularly review and adjust your cloud collaboration permissions to ensure sensitive data is only accessible to authorized individuals.
recommendations.reason: Your score indicates good knowledge here, but regular reviews are essential to maintain security as data access needs change.
